reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater warm and cozy, with a soft fleece lining that's not scratchy against the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Ever!
items.body: So comfy and beautiful!! I wear it instead of coat here in Texas! It’s soft and warm!! Absolutely Love it!!! Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Miffleton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy cozy great value cardigan
items.body: I was very impressed with this cardigan. Its super heavy and comfortable. Zipper closure and buttons. This fits well and is true to size. Material is thick, soft and warm. It washes well and is easy to layer. Would definitely repurchase Read more
items.author: Aoife O'Connell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I want to get a few more.
items.body: Seems to be well made. Good stitching. Tight knit. Sized a little small, but overall true to size. Arms are a bit long, so be prepared to turn up the cuffs. Perfect for autumn temps. Read more
items.author: BluesBabyBlu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cozy Sweater
items.body: This sweater is incredibly soft and keeps me warm without feeling heavy. The material is cozy and comfortable, making it perfect for chilly days. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and fits well
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love it!! It fits true to size, I’m a medium and it fits perfectly. I wasn’t aware that it’s not just a button down, but it also has a zipper, this was a nice surprise! I bought the brown and it’s beautiful. The length is also nice. I’m 5’1 and it sits just below my bottom and has a nice weight to it. The sleeves are also lined. It zippers up to be a turtleneck Read more
items.author: Arline L

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and warm.
items.body: Nice and warm. Only issue is the zipper starting from bottom needs to be sewn better, nothing that a few stitches won't cure. Also, when I zippered it up to the neck, the zipper was touching my face. There wasn't any material in between. I'm 5'2 and 129 lbs. I got an XL. I'm glad I did because a large would have been too small. I got mine for 29.00 which I feel is a bit overpriced but I needed something warm right away. I wanted the gray but no way would I pay 59.00 for this. I got the zipper with buttons. I like that look. Read more
items.author: nan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Zipper length, hood and pockets are odd
items.body: Pros - It is an attractive style, warm (but not really a cold weather coat), and it’s nice to have both buttons and a zipper. Some reviewers have said it runs big but, for me, it was true to size. Cons - The zipper goes up the neck past the buttons, so when fully zipped up the neck just sort of gapes. Also, the hood has no ties to secure it around your head and it’s pointy at the top, like a conehead. These explain why there are no photos of the coat fully zipped or with the hood up. Others have said that the pockets are very small, and that’s true. All you can trust putting in them is a pair of small hands. I returned this. I suppose if the zipper, hood, and pockets don’t bother you, it’s otherwise a nice sweater coat. Read more
items.author: mmf

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This sweater is not only beautiful but also highly functional, making it a perfect addition to any wardrobe. It provides exceptional warmth. The design is so appealing that it consistently garners many compliments whenever I wear it. Read more
items.author: Night Nurse

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, K Orange, Gray, Burgundy, K-grey, Dark Grey, Black, K Red, Orange, K 21 Blue, K Pink, Red, K-khaki, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
